mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS board_id, b.title, b.member, b.date, b.link, b.insertTime, b.updateTime, b.content, b.gender, u.id AS user_id, u.nickname, u.gender, u.age, u.imoji, u.friendship, u.climbing_mate, u.climbing_level, u.difficulty, u.exercise, u.frequency FROM board AS b JOIN user_table AS u ON b.userId = u.id WHERE b.date>=NOW() AND u.id NOT IN (#{userId}) ORDER BY b.date;

SELECT b.id AS board_id, b.title, b.member, b.date, b.updateTime, b.gender, u.nickname, u.imoji FROM board AS b JOIN user_table AS u ON b.userId = u.id WHERE b.date>=NOW() AND u.id NOT IN (#{userId}) ORDER BY b.updateTime;
